text: Retrospectively speaking, even seasoned navigators rarely sailed without adjustments. Financial planning resembles cartography—constantly mapping uncharted territories each year; you're normal!
Old city maps subscription—an extravagant paper trail hobby.

Definitely hits academia too - old guard still gatekeeping at times based on outdated notions rather than merit. Had run-ins handling syllabus content shaped less by factuality but perceptions of 'suitability'.
Don’t forget Marie Curie owned her male-dominated era!
